website_summaries.verdict: A slim-fit, affordably priced lunch box ice pack for kids' or adults' lunches.
pros: Customers remark on the fact that this is a good size with good cooling power in a slim design
It also gets top marks for freezing solidly and being easy to use in a variety of lunch boxes without taking up too much space
cons: Some customers experienced the packs leaking, and they may not be the best option for long-term cooling

customer_reviews.title: The Anti-Theft Lunch Device
customer_reviews.text: These work great, they stay frozen in my lunchbox at room temperature at work for about 4-6 hours, well more than enough to keep my lunch cold. Don't give in to the office pressure and put your lunch in the corporate refrigerators... The people telling you to do that are the ones who want to STEAL YOUR LUNCH! Keep your lunch at your desk by using a product like this!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Recommend for Olive Kids lunch bag 2 fit on the bottom perfectly. They stayed cold 8am thru 4pm. By 4 pm they were liquid however still cold. I use it with the Bentgo kids tray.
customer_reviews.author: MomSquared

customer_reviews.title: Planet Box Compatible!
customer_reviews.text: These fit into a Planet box! We love our Planet box lunch system, but our ice pack has been leaking. This keeps the lunch colder than their product, yet still fits into the sleeve of their case.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage! Half empty to start then leaks remaining fluid all over your food
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. They come about half full of fluid so right away your losing all that empty space of cooling power. I initially thought it would be for expansion when frozen but the fluid doesn't seem to noticeably expand when frozen. Also 2 of my 3 packs have already leaked nearly all the slimy fluid out and in the bottom of my lunch box ruining my food after only 4 uses. The cheap plastic cap welded on top is obviously crap. These are absolute garbage. I liked the idea of slim ice packs but you need to look elsewhere for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Do not stay cold very long
customer_reviews.text: Biggest issue is they only stay cold for 4-5 hours. Guessing the problem is the things are mostly plastic, and not whatever they have in them to keep them cold. This is in the same cooler where I was using ice packs of approximately the same size I made with some vacuum sealer pouches, which stayed cold and partially frozen for 19 hours. Will work for my needs, a small cooler with drinks that I use to avoid having trek to the kitchen in the middle of the night, but I would not rely on them if I were packing something for lunch in the morning and need it to still be cold at noon.
customer_reviews.author: STu

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, Didn’t  Work
customer_reviews.text: I froze these thoroughly and put two of them in a small thermal bag with some perishable food. Two hours later, the food was pretty much room temperature (& the food was cold when I placed it in the bag). I was very disappointed and wouldn’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marita Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Large surface area, nice slim fit. Freezes thoroughly and solid. I use 2-3 of these and a soft freezer pack in a typical personal, soft sided lunch cooler, and as long I make sure the cooler is zipped up, it'll stay cold/cool my entire 12 hour shift at work. I wouldn't put anything frozen in there, but things like yogurt, string cheese, fruit, and drinks are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things COLD
customer_reviews.text: After 20 years of bringing my own lunches to work-- I can now finally have a lunch that feels like it is fresh from the refrigerator. These are the BEST coldpacks I have ever purchased or used. They fit fantastically in the Bentgo Bag-- and one Chiller keeps the entire lunchbox cold. Yogurt -- cold; salad -- cool and CRISP; pasta salad for summers-- excellent. My Bento lunchbag sits at work in ambient temperatures, and the food inside feels like it comes from the refrigerator. the refreeze time is quick as well. EXCELLENT Product.
customer_reviews.author: ALP

customer_reviews.title: Stays frozen a long time
customer_reviews.text: Each ice pack is very thin and small and it stays frozen for about four hours and then it’s still cold for a while longer. My husband used it in his lunch bag which is kind of small and it worked well. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: THenderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for our kids lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: We got a fabric lunchbox from Llbean and this fits perfectly in the mesh slot to hold an ice pack. It doesn’t last as long as a traditional ice pack since it’s so thin, but it certainly lasts till lunchtime easily. That goes both ways though: it also freezes solid again much faster than a thicker ice pack. Smooth plastic is easy to clean. When it’s defrosted you can tell the plastic is pretty thin, but that’s fine. Not like this is getting thrown around or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We love these and they work great for our lunch I can just grab it throw it in the lunch box and send both the boys on their way.they don't take up a ton of room in the freezer and they keep their food cold. I'm glad that we decided to go with these because they weren't perfect. Now I wouldn't suggest it on the open in the heat in a lunch box for 12 hours and then a year lunch.but if you're taking your lunch inside and you're going to eat in six or seven hours then it's definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to complete your bentgo set up!
customer_reviews.text: Two of these individual ice packs fit perfectly into the bottom of the bentgo lunch box for kids. The pack comes with 4 individual ice packs. These ice packs don’t leak and hardly sweat! We love all our bentgo supplies!!!
customer_reviews.author: Review Queen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This little ice packs are fantastic. We use a bento lunch box for my 6yos school lunch and so I was pleased to find a product suited to fit them. It's advertised on the packaging that it will stay cold for 4 hours. However, my daughter is at school for 81⁄2 hours and when I unpack her lunch when. She gets home, the ice packs are still cold, and so is any food leftover from the day. Exceeded my expectation!
customer_reviews.author: MrsAdventure

customer_reviews.title: High Quality ice packs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these ice packs for my baby’s bottle bag and I love how thin they are so they don’t take up much space. They stay cold in my insulated bag for many hours even on a hot day. I can leave in the morning and it will keep my contents cold until the afternoon. Very pleased with the quality and size of the ice packs. It’s easy to wipe or wash clean and easy to store in the freezer since they don’t take up space at all.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Tong

customer_reviews.title: Great for kid's lunch
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use w/ the kiddo's Bentgo lunchbox and lunch bag. 2 of these fit perfectly on the bottom of the bag. We use them for little people, who are notoriously rough with things, and they are super durable. The kids like their lunches cold and these seem to do the job and keep them happy. A lot of the reviews giving these low stars don't see to realize that Bentgo is a lunchbox company and these are for lunchboxes, not weekend fishing coolers.
customer_reviews.author: Rubix_Cubed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with the customer service to back it up!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these ultra thin chillers to use in my lunch bag. Upon arrival, however, I discovered two of the chillers were cracked at the caps as a result of rough handling. After contacting Bentgo customer service, they quickly sent out a replacement pack which made the process a breeze. As far as the chiller's performance, it freezes quickly, stays frozen for at least 4-5 hours at room temperature, and conveniently fits in my lunch bag. A great option for those who prefer to keep their lunch bag outside of the corporate refrigerator!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: 12 hour road trip...
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! They made transport of a cheesecake from Dallas TX to Colorado Springs CO possible. I purchased an insulated cake carrier and needed to fit ice blocks in there. I bought two packs of these and managed two on the bottom of the cheesecake and 3 on the top (set on top of cardboard). It made the whole 12 hours. Upon arrival to our AirB&B, the ice packs had melted but, were still cold. Great product and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne H.

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Just received yesterday will update today and let you know how long they kept things cold in lunch box. Appears to be good ones. Already filled with some thing in Ice packs to help freeze packs. ( smaller than the picture. But I don't think it will make much difference. I will know more this evening and will update the review. # update doesn't keep cold but about 3 to 4 hrs and hasn't been above 80 degrees. 1 cracked open. I CAN'T RECOMMEND THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical because of the reviews but so far no complaints! I’ve been using them about a month now. I got slim because they were to keep my baby’s bottles cold for daycare; at the end of the day the packs are still cold! That’s almost 9 hours. I then started using them for my own lunch bag because the old ones I used for myself weren’t nearly as great as these. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge E.

customer_reviews.title: My current favorite lunch box ice packs
customer_reviews.text: My current favorite lunch box ice packs! I pack 3 kid lunches daily, and use lots of fresh foods that need to stay cold for several hours until lunch time. 2 fit in each lunch box (Under Armour) and are slim enough that I can fit a bento box and small water bottle or drink comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: ladyglittersparkle

customer_reviews.title: Slim and fit beside the Bentgo boxes
customer_reviews.text: These fit beside the Bentgo box just fine. You only need 2 of these, not 4. But I guess having back ups is a security. The one downside, which I hadn't thought of before purchasing is this: having 2 of these frozen, plus the Bentgo box and their school things in my kids' backpack adds a lot of weight. I have twins in Kindergarten and it made the whole backpack too heavy for them. So I will only be using these if I really have to, and will likely wait for regular use until 1st grade and try again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, not filled
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in these. The size is perfect for what I needed. However, they seemed to melt/warm up very quickly. I held them up to a light and can see they are less than 50% full of liquid. Of course they cannot be full because they would explode as the liquid freezes and expands. However, the small amount of liquid which freezes then thaws very quickly. Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wherry

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact. Just what I needed for my lunch kit. I recommend using more than one. I go to work at 7 and by the time I have lunch at 10:30 it's mostly melted.
customer_reviews.author: ala05a

customer_reviews.title: Great product to keep a bunch of things individually called
customer_reviews.text: Good product you can put multiple things in your cooler and separate them with ice packs to keep everything ice cold nice and thin orange perfectly to separate sandwiches water bottle soda bottles pickles and it's got a net on top to hold fruit in any snacks you want to keep cold it keeps.👍
customer_reviews.author: Jared T

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something light weight & thin to put in my lunch tote and these are perfect. I use 2 each day to keep my drink & snacks cold on the way to work here in the hot Mojave desert. Other products work to keep my stuff cold but take up too much space in my bag so I'm very pleased with these gems
customer_reviews.author: Tine bop

customer_reviews.title: These are OK for a few hours.
customer_reviews.text: These are OK but just OK. I like that they seem like they are just filled with water but I feel like they thaw out a lot quicker than the other ice packs I have. If it's a hot day and I'm super concerned about what I'm chilling I would definitely do a different ice pack! They do fit nicely in my daughter's lunch bag and I put one on top and one below her lunch box but I'm not in love with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: These don't stay frozen that long and it seems like the cold doesn't really even permeate the plastic. I usually end up using these in my cooler tote but then also need to use ice, otherwise these are pretty useless. They might be good for a lunch box, but if you're trying to keep a 6- or 12-pack cool for a few hours at the beach then look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are outstanding for fitting in a 6 pack beer sleeve
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding for fitting in a 6 pack beer sleeve. Hard to find these slender ones that seem to be designed perfectly for that purpose. I pack up my beers, then go play hockey, after a couple hours the beers are still thoroughly chilled. Everyone in the locker room wants these over the ones that were cold before sitting in the locker room while we play. I use a piece of gorilla tape to cover the cap and keep it secure. Otherwise, this is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Veteran Hockey Blue Liner

customer_reviews.title: Great for a day in the city!
customer_reviews.text: I live in NYC and typically pack my food for the day. I place one of these between two containers and it keeps the items cool for at least 4 hours. Even once the cooler has returned to liquid, it still remains cool. I don't use an insulated lunch box. I just toss it into my backpack. Works great and meets my needs.
customer_reviews.author: JoshuaNYC78

customer_reviews.title: Work well!,
customer_reviews.text: Used to travel home with food from Iowa to Arizona. Still cold
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Cocherell

customer_reviews.title: Stays Cold
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes. The shape, thin and rectangular makes it easy to place on the sides or bottom of the cooler. Keeps food cold until lunch. Still cold when I arrive home. Put them back in the freezer and ready for the next day. No leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Scott K

customer_reviews.title: Keeps its fresh
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the food fresh even in Arizona heat. Easy to clean, non toxic and I love how slim they are. They fit in well in a small 7x10 lunch bag. Also they are backed by an amazing company with top notch customer support with real people answering phones!
customer_reviews.author: Arianna W.

customer_reviews.title: holds cold well
customer_reviews.text: Used three of these in a lunch bag cooler on the golf course. 85 degrees when I started, 95 degrees when I finished, cooler in sun much of the time. Opened the cooler for snack and water several times. Contents were still cool after 6 hours, not icy cold, but cool enough for all to be well.
customer_reviews.author: I Love Prime

customer_reviews.title: Always use two icepacks together
customer_reviews.text: These ice packs are easy to clean, durable and pretty large. They do freeze well but do not keep cool for long. My lunch box is not the issue considering one cooler made by fit & Fresh lasts for 7 hours. These coolers you must have two to make it last that long. I was so mad to open my lunchbox and find a warm yogurt after three hours with one cooler. With two, my lunch is perfect. So, lesson learned, always use two icepacks.
customer_reviews.author: MrsRogers

customer_reviews.title: Good buy nice size.
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well with a small roll around cooler and left plenty of room. Kept some frozen items frozen all day! Would buy them again as they are also a good bargain. Fit well in my mini fridge also to freeze them.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Mac

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold long
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ice packs. I pack grandson’s lunch at 7:30am. When he gets home at 4:00 these are still cold. I put one pack on bottom of his lunch bag and one on top. Slim fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: STAYS COLD
customer_reviews.text: These actually keep your food cold all day. They are definitely worth the buy. I got to work at 3pm and even at 11pm my lunchbox was still chilled! They are thin and work really well.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Bell

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit in Bentgo
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the Bentgo lunchbox for my grandson , but didn't fit. Might have been my miss but thought the description stated it would. Oh well can use elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Mat T

customer_reviews.title: Ice packs sweat
customer_reviews.text: The ice packs sweat in my kids lunchboxes, causing their items to get wet. I ended up putting the ice pack in a ziplock bag to help hold in the moisture, which has helped some. It only stays cold a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had these ice pack for about 4 years now. I just recently bought a second set because we added and third lunch box into the rotation. These fit perfectly into the PlanetBox lunch bags. I make lunches at 6 am and they’re still cold by lunch time for my kids. We wanted something that was small and not heavy and these fit the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Kooi

customer_reviews.title: Don't stay ice cold very long
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these along with a larger ice pack for my lunch box. If you are using it to keep things cold all day at work, I wouldn't recommend them. My other ice pack stays colder way longer. They don't stay cold very long, just cool. These might be fine for those that only have one meal at lunch and don't need to keep any other snacks/food cold during the rest of the work day.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if these are leaking or what but they’ve left a sticky residue in my lunch box and one of them had a huge bubble in it popping out after freezing it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: use these every single day
customer_reviews.text: I use these with my lunchbox every day and they're always great. usually 2 on the bottom is enough to get through at least until lunch, but if you want to keep things cool all day, i suggest using 2 on the bottom and then the other 2 on the sides. easily freeze overnight, too
customer_reviews.author: TrueReviews1-2

customer_reviews.title: Great 95% of the time.
customer_reviews.text: After have them a few months and have went from winter to summer type weather I can say they are great for what I used them for 95% of the time. In a soft insulated lunch bag in a indoor environment semi climate controlled, my food stays cold/cool all day while at work. Summer I left the bag in the car, the food was warm by lunch time. Outdoors in the same bag in the summer, food just kind of stayed cool till lunch time. But outdoors In a small plastic insulated coolers the food stayed cool much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle T.

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: These work well, given the marginal bag I'm using them in. I'm sure with a better insulated bag these would do much better. Being thin, it is easy to find places for them in my crowded freezer, and they freeze quickly. I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Shevie

customer_reviews.title: Fits great in a lunchbox with bentgo box!
customer_reviews.text: So many ice blocks are so thick and can't fit into a lunchbag with a bento box, but these are super slim and fit right on top of or underneath the bentgo box in my toddler's lunch bag. They keep her lunch cold until lunchtime too!
customer_reviews.author: christina osborn

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to 6Pack Bags ice packs
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a 6 pack bag and the warranty has expired so no more free ice pack replacements. They're poor quality and I refuse to spend any dollar amount on them. I was searching for something that was similar but better quality and I hit the jackpot with these. I see that others had problems with theirs leaking but we've had zero issues as of yet. I love these ice packs!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: works but doesn't stay cold for more than 2-3 hours
customer_reviews.text: These fit in my kids lunch boxes very well, however they don't keep things cold for very long. I pack lunches the night before and refrigerate the whole lunch and lunch box, then toss the ice pack in at 8 am when we leave. By noon the ice pack is slightly colder than room temp. Anything that should be cold, like a yogurt or string cheese, isn't cold any longer. It's not awful, just not great either. I'm going to start using two of them at a time and hope that keeps things a little colder for longer.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thiel

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: I liked these ice packs at first - they were thin enough to fit in my child’s bento lunchbox. However after only a few uses one of them leaked somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! I bought a nice insulated lunch box and 9 hours after being at work they were still frozen. It kept my food cold until I was ready to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Zuspan

customer_reviews.title: Love that there is 4 in a pack!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are slim and perfect for lunchboxes with the Bentgo. We use 2 in my daughters lunch every day so I love that there is 4 in a pack so the next days Ice packs are ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: E.Moore

customer_reviews.title: What's worse than a wet lunchbox is the SMELL of this ...
customer_reviews.text: These thing leak, leak, leak. What's worse than a wet lunchbox is the SMELL of this stuff when it is no longer frozen. I had to throw them all out.
customer_reviews.author: Banderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a lunch bucket. Keeps food cold. Easy to freeze because it’s thin. Love the purple color. Stands out as mine. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Good for about 4 hours.
customer_reviews.text: I love how slim and tall they are. But the thinness results in a dramatic drop off in cooling after 4 hours. Anything less than that , and these are great.
customer_reviews.author: mario

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a medium to smaller lunch tote
customer_reviews.text: Great, thin , coolers. Good for smaller lunch totes too. Set one on each side, good to go! Once frozen they work like any other gel, filled cooler. Not thick so don't expect hours and hours of cooling if left out in the heat . If placed inside a fridge, will stay pretty much frozen.
customer_reviews.author: Bootsie

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great size ice packs. Not too bulky. Fits nicely in standard kid's lunchboxes. Has not leaked so far and keeps food nicely chilled for school.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Stays Frozen and fits in everything!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to reorder these ice packs because everyone loves and borrowed them or my daughter leaves them in the locker and people grab them! Thin enough to fit under the sandwich in the lunch box or sack and they stay COLD for a LONG time!!! BUY THESE!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, works as expected, price was right. One lasts about 4 hrs in a standard soft-side cooler lunch bag, 2 lasts about 6.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary J Welch

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what we expected.bwe use them for our Kindergartener's lunch box. They are obviously much lighter and take up less room than the standard cold packs. They are easy to clean and wipe off, even after sitting in spilled pickle juice for 5+ hours.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaB

customer_reviews.title: They made it right
customer_reviews.text: Update: Bentgo contacted me & sent a replacement set. I definitely appreciate the effort to "make it right". So far they are working perfectly with no leaking issues. My shipment was inexplicably delayed & to add insult to injury, 2 if the 4 ice packs had leaked. Very disappointing! They were otherwise just the right size for my cooler. I simply cannot use leaky ice packs near my expressed breastmilk so I guess I will keep looking for a better option ...
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, place these in a lunch bag for golf and after 2.5 hours my apples were warm. I put two of them in the lunch bag. Now I need to find something else. They are thin.
customer_reviews.author: Bullwinkle

customer_reviews.title: In climate controlled places (like the truck or office) they are perfect in my soft sided lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: These are very thin, so they don't take up much room. The trade off is that they don't stay frozen for much longer than a few hours. Depending on your use, that may not be a problem! In climate controlled places (like the truck or office) they are perfect in my soft sided lunchbox.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect pricing was fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go and travel food bags for road trips they're fantastic if you buy the bags that are thermal beast particular ice packs are perfect because they are thinner and take up less room
customer_reviews.author: DENISE

customer_reviews.title: Do not stay frozen very long
customer_reviews.text: These do not last longer than 2 hours from frozen solid. They warm up very quickly. I'm pretty sure they are just thin plastic flasks filled with plain water
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Not cold for long
customer_reviews.text: I liked these because of the compact size that I could squeeze them around food items but they just don't hold a cold temp like a single larger ice pack. I would return if I didn't throw the wrapper away.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Just one keeps my lunch cold for hours! My food feels like it has been in the frig. Leaves a lot more room in my lunch bag compared to the old style.
customer_reviews.author: KMG

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I put all 4 in my lunch box(its a big lunch box) and my food stays cold the whole day. After being gone for 10 hours, I come home and these are still mostly frozen. They keep for a long time. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sarulle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for lunches or for layering with food in ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for lunches or for layering with food in a smaller cooler. Bought a set and liked them so much after 2 months that I bought two more sets so I can use them in a cooler full of food. They stack nicely in my freezer door.
customer_reviews.author: SB3

customer_reviews.title: Great little ice packs
customer_reviews.text: Use these in my husbands lunch box. They are great they are so thin they hardly take up any space but still keep his lunch cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, have even dropped and it didn't break. Easy to wash, doesnt look like it could leak. They're small enough to put two in a lunch box and keep cold all day
customer_reviews.author: Htomato

customer_reviews.title: Work great with our PlanetBoxes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these super-thin ice packs. They work great with our Planetbox lunch boxes (both Rover & Shuttle) & fit perfectly in the sleeve inside the bags. And MUCH cheaper than the ones from their website. Plus, I like that these are hard plastic and cannot be "popped" by mischievous kids in the lunchroom. :)
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these lunch chillers. Love that their slim profile leaves more room for my son’s lunch! They stay cold long enough until lunch time and I just pop them back in the freezer when he gets back home
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: They thaw out way too quickly. They only lasted an hour
customer_reviews.author: Apryl

customer_reviews.title: Great concept. Poor results.
customer_reviews.text: These little ice packs are great conceptually but do not remain cold. They melt very quickly. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job, slim profile
customer_reviews.text: Very slim profile and hasn't let us down. Definitely keeps food cold in the insulated lunch bag for the 6 hours that we've needed. I'm sure it can do longer. It's a little smaller profile than the actual foot print of the Bentgo lunch boxes but that doesn't seem to be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: betsy

customer_reviews.title: Bentgo Ice Lunch Chillers Ultra-thin Ice Packs (4 Pack - Green)
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with this product. Not what I expected ( I guess I expect too much). failed to keep water, food cold for a max of 2hours
customer_reviews.author: Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold all day
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my lunch bag to keep items cold. This actually also kept frozen items frozen for many hours. By the end of the day ~12 hours the ice packs are melted but still very cold and keep my items cold for 12 hours. I do use a regular insulated lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rehana Pirani

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my son’s lunchbox. They are still partially frozen when he comes home 8 hours later. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BostonLaura

customer_reviews.title: great slim ice pack
customer_reviews.text: works great in her lunchbox. the 4 pack means that there is always one or more ready :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Slim and helpful
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and slim so it doesn’t crush my kids food in their lunchbox and we can fit everything better.
customer_reviews.author: Carlita lolita

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Packs
customer_reviews.text: The ice packs are well made and work as advertised. It is a great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: teknut

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My sons cold packs are still cold when he gets home from school! They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Shanti m

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Decent Price
customer_reviews.text: I use these for mine and my kids’ lunches and they stay frozen for a decent amount of time and the size makes it easy for them to fit in most lunch bags.
customer_reviews.author: Midge

customer_reviews.title: Would buy ahain
customer_reviews.text: Love the thinness and the size! Perfect for our lunchbots container from amazon. It does keep my daughters food cool until lunch. The ice packs were melted but still cool by 2/3 pm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I feel like Ice packs use to last longer. They don’t stay frozen very long. I’m worried about summer usage. Otherwise I have no issues
customer_reviews.author: mary h.

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: perfect for school lunches, doesn't take up too much room but stays cold all day!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love the slim design
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for lunch boxes. They don't take up too much room and aren't very heavy. Keep food cold, would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cooler and it has these slots on both ends. These ice pack actually fit rt into those slots perfectly which leaves the other two to add between my beers when I travel thank you fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Eh! Will keep something slightly cool, if that's all you need. I wouldn't buy this again. Did not keep my yogurt cold. Threw yogurt out. Instead, I put a yogurt in the freezer the night before. It was perfect by lunch time. You could use these for an ache or a pain, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Thin Ice Packs
customer_reviews.text: The ice packs are thin so they do not take up much room. The ice packs keep cold a long time in a cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Irv

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold for hours
customer_reviews.text: I use these ice packs for my daughters' lunches, and the ice pack stays cold for hours. I like that they're lightweight and don't take up much space in their lunch bags.
customer_reviews.author: KySoph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly in my lunchbox. They last all day at my office job.
customer_reviews.author: Sneake

customer_reviews.title: Slender fit perfect for small cooler
customer_reviews.text: I like the slender ice pack, allows for more room. Stay cold all day in cooler, easy to clean. Use about 4/5 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Great ice packa!
customer_reviews.text: I looooove these! They are the perfect size for our rectangular lunch boxes. They keep my kids' food cold and there are no worries of spills. The material is hard plastic and none of them have broken so far after a year+. Definitely get them!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Keeps everything cold and they are space saving.
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have! Perfect for any bento boxes or lunch box. My daughter has target bentos and a justice lunch box. They are still cold when she gets home. I Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little ice blocks. They’re perfect for lunch boxes to keep your food from spoiling. Because they’re so thin they might thaw, but the cold will keep your food safe until it’s lunch time.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Oleo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size & shape for lunch packs.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size & shape for lunch packs. I use two at once.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!

product_meta.title: Bentgo Ice Lunch Chillers - Ultra-Thin Ice Packs Perfect for Everyday Use in Lunch Bags, Lunch Boxes and Coolers - 4 Pack (Green)
product_meta.description:
Color:GreenKeep your food fresh longer with Bentgo’s colorful array of slim Lunch Chillers. These hard, extra-thin ice packs freeze quickly and take up virtually none of the precious space you need in your lunch bag or cooler for food and beverages. Pack your favorite meals, dairy snacks, beverages and more with complete confidence that they will stay cold throughout the day.

Lunch Chillers are reusable and easy to clean. Simply hand wash, dry and return to the freezer. This convenient ice pack for lunch box is a non-toxic, BPA-free cooling solution that is backed by Bentgo’s 1-Year Warranty.
feature_bullets: KEEPS FOOD & DRINKS COLD: Freezes quickly and helps food and beverages stay cold up to 4 hours — ideal for school, work, picnics, game day, and more.
ULTRA-SLIM DESIGN: Measuring just 0.3” thick, each ultra-thin ice pack fits perfectly into our Bentgo lunch bags as well as any lunch bag or cooler and leaves maximum room for food and beverages.
100% SAFE & NON-TOXIC: Made with durable, leakproof, and reusable food-grade safe plastic that contains no BPA, PVC, phthalates, lead, or vinyl.
EASY TO CLEAN: Simply wipe down with a damp cloth or hand wash for quick daily cleaning.

PURCHASE WITH A PURPOSE: Bentgo continues to be a proud supporter of Feed the Children, a 501(c)(3) nonprofit that gives hope and resources for hungry children and families. Since 2017, Bentgo has donated more than $200,000 to help put an end to hunger.
